title: Risk Levels
description: Controlled vocabulary for technical risk classification (aligned with ISO 31000)

levels.label: Low Risk
levels.description: Minimal impact, well-understood technology, low uncertainty

levels.label: Medium Risk
levels.description: Moderate impact, some technical challenges, manageable uncertainty

levels.label: High Risk
levels.description: Significant impact, complex technical challenges, high uncertainty

levels.label: Critical Risk
levels.description: Severe impact, unproven technology, very high uncertainty
